grahampaige.comment:
And after listening to all this great input from everyone else around here tonight, I'm going to go ahead with what we've heard so far too because there was nothing really new added by Mr. Page at least not anything different than he has said previously about his concerns over these two items being pulled out separately rather than just having them included within the entire package which would make more sense if they were part of an overall plan but since they're standalone motions then maybe doing something like Dr. Acuff suggested might work better where those who want could sign up individually without any pressure either way anyway given everything i guess im still voting yes
vote Yes. The motion passes unanimously. We'll now move into closed session.
